name: Hadamard Gate
description: Combination of two rotations, π about the Z-axis followed by π/2 about the Y-axis

name: Pauli-X Gate
description: Apply rotation around the X-axis by π radians

name: Pauli-Y Gate
description: Apply rotation around the Y-axis by π radians

name: Pauli-Z Gate
description: Apply rotation around the Z-axis by π radians
